scripts.lint-md-input: ls *.md texts/*.md grammar/*.md | xargs -n 300 npm run prettier-js
scripts.lint-md-output: ls word-list/*.md | xargs -n 300 npm run prettier-js
scripts.pre-lint: npm run lint-yaml && npm run lint-md-input && npm run lint-js
scripts.post-lint: npm run lint-yaml && npm run lint-md-output
scripts.lint: npm run pre-lint && npm run post-lint
scripts.test: npm run pre-lint && npm run verify-word-list && npm run sort-word-list && npm run render && npm run post-lint
